name: Green Beans With Mustard Oil And Black Mustard Seeds
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, green beans, mustard seed, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 pound green beans, washed, ends snipped off
1/2 teaspoon black mustard seeds (see note; if unavailable, use yellow mustard seeds)
1 bunch scallions, white and pale green parts, sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a large saucepan with water and bring to a boil. Add salt to taste and the beans. Cook until the beans are tender but still firm, about 4 minutes. Drain and set aside.

In large skillet, heat the oil with the mustard seeds. As soon as seeds begin to pop, about 2 to 3 minutes, add the scallions. Saute for 20 seconds, then add the beans, tossing them until the oil is evenly distributed.
Add the cilantro and toss again. Taste for salt and serve.
